china_free_email.description: True if email is a free China email, i.e 163.com.

comment.description: Field for comments or correlating text

dirty_words_domain.description: True if domain contains dirty/bad words.

dirty_words_username.description: True if username contains dirty/bad words.

disposable.description: True if email is disposable, i.e yopmail.com.

dmarc_configured.description: True if domain has DMARC records configured.

dmarc_enforced.description: True if domain is configured for DMARC and set to an enforcement policy.

domain_popular.description: True if domain is a known popular domain.

educational_domain.description: True if domain is an educational domain, i.e .edu

email.description: The email address that was queried.

free_email.description: True if email is a free email, i.e gmail.com.

government_domain.description: True if domain is a government domain, i.e .gov

has_a_records.description: True if domain has A records configured.

has_mx_records.description: True if domain has MX records configured.

has_spf_records.description: True if domain has SPF records configured.

is_spoofable.description: True if domain does not have SPF records or if ~all is not configured.

police_domain.description: True if domain is a police domain (such as *polizei*, *police*, etc).

risky_tld.description: True if domain TLD is risky, i.e .top or .pro.

role_address.description: True if email is a role address, i.e admin@website.com

russian_free_email.description: True if email is a free Russian email, i.e mail.ru.

should_block.description: True if the score is bad (<= 70) and thus it should be blocked.

suspicious_domain.description: True if domain is suspicious, i.e known spam or parked.

suspicious_email.description: True if email is considered suspicious.

suspicious_username.description: True if username is suspicious, i.e only numbers.

username.description: Username part of the email address (email prefix)

valid_format.description: True if email has a valid format.

valid_tld.description: True if domain TLD is valid, i.e .com or .co.uk

description: Apivoid email verification API result. Reference: https://www.apivoid.com/api/email-verify/
name: apivoid-email-verification
